body.name: WOWBOX Adhesive Shower Caddy Shelf, 2 Pack - Hanging Bathroom Organizer, No Drilling Stainless Black Shelves for Storage & Home Decor
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 15 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 28 secs
features: 【What is included】2 x Shower Caddies with Hooks, 2 x Transparent Adhesive Stickers, and 1 x User Manual.

【Bathroom Space Saver】Place shampoo, soap, facial cleanser, hair conditioner, bath gel in shower caddy to save space. The hooks besides can be used for storing towel, razor, bath puff, etc. Organize all toiletries together with shower caddies to keep your room tidy & organized.

【Stainless Steel & Coating】100% rust-proof metal frame with additional rust-proof coating. While further enhancing the anti-rust ability, it makes the surface smoother and prevents moisture residue. Hollow design at the bottom helps to quickly drain moisture and keeps the bathroom dry.

【Strong Frame & Adhesive】Upgraded the metal frame with an additional fence on the front to make the structure stronger, increasing stability and load-bearing capacity over 30 lb. The transparent adhesive provides strong stability while maintaining the beauty of the bathroom. Conveniently use without drilling or installation.

【More Uses】Besides being used in bathroom for storing toiletries, this caddy is also suitable for bedroom, kitchen, and living room. It is a great shelf for placing snacks, drink, photo frame, jar, bottles, potted plants, etc. Plays a role in storage, convenient daily use and keep the room clean, and also a good decorative shelf to decorate every space in the room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got sick of my shower shelves being stocked with every product. When I saw it, it was incredibly elegant and strong. The adhesive truly holds, and the setup was quite simple! I adore how elegant it makes my bathroom look and how it assists in clearing out the clutter within my shower. Even with my frequent hot showers, the adhesive is still strong after several weeks of use. The enormous shampoo and conditioner bottles fit perfectly in the shower caddy's great capacity. The stainless steel shower caddy is impervious to rust. It's comforting to know that the product will maintain its smooth, beautiful appearance without developing unsightly rust.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy Installation and Sturdy Hold – Five Stars for Shelf Caddies!
reviews.reviewText: I am thrilled to give these shelf caddies a well-deserved five-star rating! The installation was a breeze, and the adhesive has held up admirably so far – I've had them up for about a week now. I'll be sure to update if anything changes, but as of now, they're still securely in place!These caddies are proving their worth by holding substantial items with ease. One is carrying the large Dr. Bronner's soap bottle, and the other is effortlessly supporting a Dove sensitive skin bottle. The sturdy construction and reliable adhesive make these caddies a practical addition to any bathroom.In conclusion, if you're looking for shelf caddies that are not only easy to install but also deliver a robust hold, these are the ones to go for. Five stars for their performance and ability to support sizable items without any fuss!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars awesome shower caddies!!
reviews.reviewText: these adhere very well, hold what they're supposed to (including larger bottles like dr bronner's), and look really sharp and not cheap at all. great product at a great price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars These worked great!
reviews.reviewText: Great for a shower stall that has no shelves. Better than suction hooks!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have these in all of my bathrooms. They are easy to attach and hold all of my shower items and keeps things off the floor or side of tub.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These sure are handy little caddies in the shower. I bought them because I think my daughter collects shampoo and conditioner and we were out of room along the edges of the bathtub. These stick great- like really great! They are very cute, stylish, sturdy. They stick on super easy and look great! Thank you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These shower shelves are great! They are very easy to install, very sturdy, and can house many items. I think the only thing to make these even better is to make a spot for a bar of soap. Soap can sit on these but the slats are wide so the soap can slip through if not placed perpendicular. Overall though, great quality- I will be buying another set for our second shower!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: One of my favorite purchases for my spa bathroom. Its just the perfect addition; it looks exactly like the photo. The adhesive surpassed my expectations. With 3 kids in the house pressure has been applied to these and they have not budged at all. I wish it came in gold.
